hero.title: Break Barriers, Build Bridges
hero.subtitle: Real-time chat, transcription, and translation. Unlock Brazil's top tech talent with seamless communication.

solution.title: Communication Without Limits
solution.description: Brazilicode offers real-time chat, transcription, and translation with video integration, enabling seamless collaboration between global companies and top-tier Brazilian developers.

benefits.title: The Platform Designed for Global Collaboration

translation.question: How does real-time translation work?
translation.answer: Our AI-powered tools provide instant translations during chats and video calls, ensuring clear communication.

transcriptions.question: Can I download chat transcriptions?
transcriptions.answer: Yes, all chats and video transcriptions are available for download in multiple languages.

industries.question: What industries do you cater to?
industries.answer: We specialize in connecting tech companies with top Brazilian developers but are open to other sectors.

security.question: How secure is the platform?
security.answer: We use end-to-end encryption to ensure all communications and data are secure.

onboarding.question: What's the onboarding process like?
onboarding.answer: It's quick and seamless! You can start collaborating with talent in under two weeks.
